alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay County through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 420 PM EDT/320 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Panama City Beach, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Sunnyside, Brannonville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
